text: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

translation.en: Not equal are the companions of the Fire and the companions of Paradise. The companions of Paradise - they are the attainers [of success]
translation.id: Tidak sama para penghuni neraka dengan para penghuni surga; para penghuni surga itulah orang-orang yang memperoleh kemenangan
